apiValue.shortdesc: The BCP-47 language code, such as, "en-US" or "sr-Latn".

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The BCP-47 language code, such as, "en-US" or "sr-Latn". For more information, see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unicode_locale_identifier.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A text element recognized in an image.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A text element recognized in an image. A text element is roughly equivalent to a space-separated word in most Latin-script languages.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized text element.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized text element. The value is 0 for all text recognizers except for cloud text recognizers with model type VisionCloudTextModelType.dense.

apiValue.shortdesc: The four corner points of the text element in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The four corner points of the text element in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space. The objects are flash.geom.Points.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the text element relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the text element relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the text element.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the text element. On-device text recognizers only detect Latin-based languages, while cloud text recognizers can detect multiple languages. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the text element that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the text element that was recognized.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A text line recognized in an image that consists of an array of elements.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A text line recognized in an image that consists of an array of elements.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized text line.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized text line. The value is null for all text recognizers except for cloud text recognizers with model type VisionCloudTextModelType.dense.

apiValue.shortdesc: The four corner points of the text line in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The four corner points of the text line in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space. The objects are flash.geom.Points.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of text elements that make up the line.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of text elements that make up the line.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the text line relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the text line relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the text line.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the text line. On-device text recognizers only detect Latin-based languages, while cloud text recognizers can detect multiple languages. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the text line that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the text line that was recognized.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of blocks recognized in the text.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of blocks recognized in the text.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the recognized text.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the recognized text.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A text block recognized in an image that consists of an array of text lines.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A text block recognized in an image that consists of an array of text lines.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized text block. The value is 0 for all text recognizers except for cloud text recognizers with model type CloudTextModelType.dense.

apiValue.shortdesc: The four corner points of the text block in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The four corner points of the text block in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the text block relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the text block relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the text block. On-device text recognizers only detect Latin-based languages, while cloud text recognizers can detect multiple languages. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the text block that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the text block that was recognized.
